name: axon
title: Axon - Wordnik & Wikipedia add-on
description:
Axon provides access to the Wordnik dictionary and all Wikipedia articles in every language. 

Double-click on a word to open the Wordnik dictionary definition in a speech balloon. If the word could not be found Axon continues on Wikipedia. To search Wikipedia immediately, hold down the hotkey and double-click on a word.
author: Ivo van Kamp

options.label: Double-click a word or select text

preferences.name: wordnikDictionary
preferences.title: Wordnik dictionary
preferences.description: Select the dictionary you would like to search

options.label: All dictionaries (in the order presented below)
GNU Collaborative International Dictionary of English
